column13: you genuinely connect with them, and that connection makes the journey through the kingdom of Euchronia all the more rewarding. The fantasy setting itself is stunning. Euchronia feels like a living, breathing world, full of wonder and mystery. There’s a sense of freedom in exploring its landscapes, and you’re constantly rewarded for your curiosity with new discoveries and challenges. It’s that old-school RPG vibe where every step forward feels like the start of a new adventure, and you never know what’s waiting for you around the next corner. One of ATLUS's biggest strengths has always been their attention to detail in presentation, and Metaphor continues this tradition with its stylish UI and stunning art direction. Everything from the menu designs to the in-game visuals shows a level of polish that makes each moment feel special. The vibrant, imaginative world of Euchronia comes to life with ATLUS's signature flair, making every scene and battle feel like a work of art. One of the best things ATLUS has done with Metaphor is make it multiplatform from day one and it shows with the Steam version reaching peak CCU of 85 961. It’s great to see more people getting a chance to experience what this incredible dev team can do and has done for years. And with this kind of momentum, it’s impossible not to be hyped about what they’ll do next, especially with Persona 6 on the horizon. Metaphor is a collection of many things, a journey filled with heart, soul, discovery, bonds and not in last place - style, and it's definitely one that fans of the RPG genre wouldn’t want to miss."
